EmailTemplate.description: Alert to notify users when they are listed to approve/reject a CR
EmailTemplate.name: Strongpoint Change Request Alert
EmailTemplate.subject: Strongpoint Change Request to approve
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!FLODocs__FLO_Change_Request__c.FLODocs__Approver__c},
You have a Change Request to Approve/Reject. Please review the CR {!FLODocs__FLO_Change_Request__c.Link} and move forward with the process. Regards, Strongpoint CONTACT Strongpoint
80 Peter Street, Toronto Ontario M5V1J9 | Phone: 877-368-7741 | Email: info@flo-partners.com
